attributes.action: Stop Banks from taking risks with the savings, homes and pensions of hard working families in order to enrich  the untouchable few.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Speculators should be free to gamble their own money and get rich in the process. They do not deserve to have their discretionary bonuses capped.

Hard working families should be free to save, with instititions that are only concerned with protecting the savings of hard working families.

 They do not deserve to pay with their jobs, savings and pensions to bail the speculators against losses and, to add insult to job loss, poverty, and homelessness.

The Government is requested to not only allow speculators to speculate - using their own money,but also  allow hard working families the opportunity to choose not to be the  guarantors of bonuses, discretionary or otherwise.
